A Track that contains audio waveform data.

bool WaveTrack::Get ( samplePtr  buffer,
sampleFormat  format,
sampleCount  start,
sampleCount  len 
)

MM: Now that each wave track can contain multiple clips, we don't have a continous space of samples anymore, but we simulate it, because there are alot of places (e.g. effects) using this interface. This interface makes much sense for modifying samples, but note that it is not time-accurate, because the "offset" is a double value and therefore can lie inbetween samples. But as long as you use the same value for "start" in both calls to "Set" and "Get" it is guaranteed that the same samples are affected.

References ClearSamples(), GetClipIterator(), WaveClip::GetEndSample(), WaveClip::GetNumSamples(), WaveClip::GetSamples(), WaveClip::GetStartSample(), and SAMPLE_SIZE.

Referenced by CompareAudioCommand::Apply(), EffectAutoDuck::ApplyDuckFade(), EffectChangePitch::DeduceFrequencies(), FreqWindow::GetAudio(), TrackPanel::HitTestSamples(), Mixer::MixSameRate(), Mixer::MixVariableRates(), AudacityProject::NearestZeroCrossing(), VoiceKey::OffBackward(), VoiceKey::OffForward(), VoiceKey::OnBackward(), VoiceKey::OnForward(), BenchmarkDialog::OnRun(), VampEffect::Process(), EffectTruncSilence::Process(), EffectAutoDuck::Process(), EffectTwoPassSimpleMono::ProcessOne(), EffectStereoToMono::ProcessOne(), EffectSoundTouch::ProcessOne(), EffectSimpleMono::ProcessOne(), EffectRepair::ProcessOne(), EffectNormalize::ProcessOne(), EffectNoiseRemoval::ProcessOne(), EffectFindClipping::ProcessOne(), EffectEqualization::ProcessOne(), EffectEcho::ProcessOne(), EffectClickRemoval::ProcessOne(), EffectChangeSpeed::ProcessOne(), EffectReverse::ProcessOneClip(), EffectSoundTouch::ProcessStereo(), LadspaEffect::ProcessStereo(), AudioUnitEffect::ProcessStereo(), EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack< _DataType, _xxxSample >::ProcessTwo(), resampleCB(), VoiceKey::TestDirectionChanges(), VoiceKey::TestEnergy(), and VoiceKey::TestSignChanges().
